target.title: Objective
target.body: Training and assessment of skills in diagnosing asynchronous motors.

task.title: Task
body: 1. Checking the free rotation of the shaft.
2. Checking the windings for breaks and short circuits.
4. Connecting the winding to the required scheme, star or delta.
5. Connecting the power supply, initial start without load.

safety.title: Safety
safety.body: A complex of events has been thought out and modeled, in which a short circuit occurs, equipment is damaged, or harm is done to a person.

problems.title: Problems and Challenges
body: During the work, the system reacts to the actions of the trainee and, in case of incorrect actions, leads to various motor malfunctions.
A model of the motor's behavior has been thought out for all possible malfunctions and incorrect sequences of actions of the trainee.

result.title: Result
result.body: The system provides automatic assessment of the work done and feedback from the course instructor.
